source.name: Hazmat Registration Statistics - 2003
source.description: A data file is provided on this page for the current registration year and each of the previous years. Each file contains information supplied by the registered company in the application that includes the specified year, including the company name and address, contact information, business classifications, associated identification numbers, and an indication of the activities requiring registration in which the company engages. Because amendments to existing registrations and new registrations for any year are possible, these files are updated regularly
